title: A Privacy-Preserving and Verifiable Federated Learning Scheme
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, __[1] combine the Chinese Remainder Theorem and the Paillier homomorphic encrytion__ to apply on clients' gradients to preserve privacy, [2] __use a bilinear aggregate signature technology to verify the correctness of the aggregated gradient from the server__ to prevent malicious server
